alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Calcasieu; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 2:22PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jefferson Davis, southeastern Beauregard, northeastern Calcasieu and southern Allen Parishes through 245 PM CDT... At 222 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fenton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Iowa, Kinder, Oberlin, Elton, Fenton, Reeves, Mittie, Moss Bluff, Buller, Harmony, Topsy, Lebleu Settlement, Gillis, Pine Island and Leblanc. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 36 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
